register.name: ACTLR
register.description: Disables certain aspects of functionality within the processor

bitField.name: DISOOFP
bitField.description: Disables floating point instructions completing out of order with respect to integer instructions

bitField.name: DISFPCA
bitField.description: Disable automatic update of CONTROL.FPCA

bitField.name: DISFOLD
bitField.description: Disables folding of IT instructions

bitField.name: DISDEFWBUF
bitField.description: Disables write buffer use during default memory map accesses

bitField.name: DISMCYCINT
bitField.description: Disables interruption of multi-cycle instructions

register.name: ICSR
register.description: Provides software control of the NMI, PendSV, and SysTick exceptions, and provides interrupt status information

bitField.name: NMIPENDSET
bitField.description: Activates an NMI exception or reads back the current state

bitField.name: PENDSVSET
bitField.description: Sets a pending PendSV interrupt or reads back the current state

bitField.name: PENDSVCLR
bitField.description: Clears a pending PendSV interrupt

bitField.name: PENDSTSET
bitField.description: Sets a pending SysTick or reads back the current state

bitField.name: PENDSTCLR
bitField.description: Clears a pending SysTick, whether set here or by the timer hardware

bitField.name: ISRPREEMPT
bitField.description: Indicates whether a pending exception will be serviced on exit from debug halt state

bitField.name: ISRPENDING
bitField.description: Indicates if an external configurable, NVIC generated, interrupt is pending

bitField.name: VECTPENDING
bitField.description: The exception number for the highest priority pending exception. 0 indicates no pending exceptions

bitField.name: RETTOBASE
bitField.description: In Handler mode, indicates whether there is an active exception other than the exception indicated by the current value of the IPSR

bitField.name: VECTACTIVE
bitField.description: The exception number for the current executing exception

register.name: VTOR
register.description: Holds the vector table address

bitField.name: TBLOFF
bitField.description: Bits [31:7] of the vector table address

bitField.name: TBLBASE
bitField.description: Determines whether the vector table is in the code or SRAM memory region

register.name: DEMCR
register.gui_name: Debug Exception and Monitor Control Register
register.description: Manages vector catch behaviour and DebugMonitor handling when debugging

bitField.name: MON_EN
bitField.description: Enable the DebugMonitor exception

bitField.name: MON_PEND
bitField.description: Sets or clears the pending state of the DebugMonitor exception

register.name: AIRCR
register.description: Sets or returns interrupt control data

bitField.name: VECTKEY
bitField.description: Vector Key

bitField.name: VECTKEYSTAT
bitField.description: UNKNOWN

bitField.name: ENDIANNESS
bitField.description: Indicates the memory system data endianness

bitField.name: PRIGROUP
bitField.description: Priority grouping, indicates the binary point position.

bitField.name: SYSRESETREQ
bitField.description: System Reset Request

bitField.name: VECTCLRACTIVE
bitField.description: Clears all active state information for fixed and configurable exceptions

register.name: SCR
register.description: Sets or returns system control data

bitField.name: SEVONPEND
bitField.description: Determines whether an interrupt transition from inactive state to pending state is a wakeup event

bitField.name: SLEEPDEEP
bitField.description: Hint indicating that waking from sleep might take longer

bitField.name: SLEEPONEXIT
bitField.description: whether, on an exit from an ISR that returns to the base level of execution priority, the processor enters a sleep state

register.name: CCR
register.description: Configuration and Control

bitField.name: BP
bitField.description: Setting this bit to 1 enables branch prediction, also called program flow prediction

bitField.name: IC
bitField.description: This is a global enable bit for instruction caches

bitField.name: DC
bitField.description: This is a global enable bit for data and unified caches

bitField.name: STKALIGN
bitField.description: Determines whether the exception entry sequence guarantees 8-byte stack frame alignment, adjusting the SP if necessary before saving state

bitField.name: BFHFNMIGN
bitField.description: Determines the effect of precise data access faults on handlers running at priority -1 or priority -2

bitField.name: DIV_0_TRP
bitField.description: Controls the trap on divide by 0

bitField.name: UNALIGN_TRP
bitField.description: Controls the trapping of unaligned word or halfword accesses

bitField.name: USERSETMPEND
bitField.description: Controls whether unprivileged software can access the STIR

bitField.name: NONBASETHRDENA
bitField.description: Controls whether the processor can enter Thread mode at an execution priority level other than base level

register.name: SHPR1
register.description: Sets or returns priority for system handlers 4-7

bitField.name: PRI_7
bitField.description: Priority of system handler 7

bitField.name: PRI_6
bitField.description: Priority of system handler 6, UsageFault

bitField.name: PRI_5
bitField.description: Priority of system handler 5, BusFault

bitField.name: PRI_4
bitField.description: Priority of system handler 4, MemManage

register.name: SHPR2
register.description: Sets or returns priority for system handlers 8-11

bitField.name: PRI_11
bitField.description: Priority of system handler 11, SVCall

bitField.name: PRI_10
bitField.description: Priority of system handler 10

bitField.name: PRI_9
bitField.description: Priority of system handler 9

bitField.name: PRI_8
bitField.description: Priority of system handler 8

register.name: SHPR3
register.description: Sets or returns priority for system handlers 12-15

bitField.name: PRI_15
bitField.description: Priority of system handler 15, SysTick

bitField.name: PRI_14
bitField.description: Priority of system handler 14, PendSV

bitField.name: PRI_13
bitField.description: Priority of system handler 13

bitField.name: PRI_12
bitField.description: Priority of system handler 4, DebugMonitor

register.name: SHCSR
register.description: Controls and provides the active and pending status of system exceptions

bitField.name: USGFAULTENA
bitField.description: Enable UsageFault

bitField.name: BUSFAULTENA
bitField.description: Enable BusFault

bitField.name: MEMFAULTENA
bitField.description: Enable MemManage fault

bitField.name: SVCALLPENDED
bitField.description: SVCall pending

bitField.name: BUSFAULTPENDED
bitField.description: BusFault pending

bitField.name: MEMFAULTPENDED
bitField.description: MemManage pending

bitField.name: USGFAULTPENDED
bitField.description: UsageFault pending

bitField.name: SYSTICKACT
bitField.description: SysTick active

bitField.name: PENDSVACT
bitField.description: PendSV active

bitField.name: MONITORACT
bitField.description: Monitor active

bitField.name: SVCALLACT
bitField.description: SVCall active

bitField.name: USGFAULTACT
bitField.description: UsageFault active

bitField.name: BUSFAULTACT
bitField.description: BusFault active

bitField.name: MEMFAULTACT
bitField.description: MemManage active

register.name: CFSR
register.description: Contains the three Configurable Fault Status Registers MMFSR, BFSR, UFSR

bitField.name: DIVBYZERO
bitField.description: Divide by zero error

bitField.name: UNALIGNED
bitField.description: Unaligned access error

bitField.name: NOCP
bitField.description: Coprocessor access error

bitField.name: INVPC
bitField.description: Integrity check error on EXC_RETURN

bitField.name: INVSTATE
bitField.description: Instruction executed with invalid EPSR.T or EPSR.IT field

bitField.name: UNDEFINSTR
bitField.description: Processor has attempted to execute an undefined instruction.

bitField.name: BFARVALID
bitField.description: BFAR has valid contents

bitField.name: LSPERR
bitField.description: Bus fault during FP lazy state preservation

bitField.name: STKERR
bitField.description: Derived bus fault on exception entry

bitField.name: UNSTKERR
bitField.description: Derived bus fault on exception return

bitField.name: IMPRECISERR
bitField.description: Imprecise data access error

bitField.name: PRECISERR
bitField.description: Precise data access error

bitField.name: IBUSERR
bitField.description: Bus fault on an instruction prefetch

bitField.name: MMARVALID
bitField.description: MMAR has valid contents

bitField.name: MLSPERR
bitField.description: MemManage fault during FP lazy state preservation

bitField.name: MSTKERR
bitField.description: Derived MemManage fault on exception entry

bitField.name: MUNSTKERR
bitField.description: Derived MemManage fault on exception return

bitField.name: DACCVIOL
bitField.description: Data access violation. The MMAR shows the data address that the load or store tried to access

bitField.name: IACCVIOL
bitField.description: MPU or Execute Never (XN) default memory map access violation on an instruction fetch

register.name: HFSR
register.description: Shows the cause of any hard faults

bitField.name: DEBUGEVT
bitField.description: Indicates a Debug event has occurred

bitField.name: FORCED
bitField.description: Indicates a fault with configurable priority has been escalated to a HardFault

bitField.name: VECTTBL
bitField.description: Indicates a fault has occurred because of a vector table read error on exception processing

register.name: DFSR
register.description: Shows, at the top level, why a debug event occurred

bitField.name: EXTERNAL
bitField.description: Indicates a debug event generated because of the assertion of EDBGRQ

bitField.name: VCATCH
bitField.description: Indicates triggering of a Vector catch

bitField.name: DWTTRAP
bitField.description: Indicates a debug event generated by the DWT

bitField.name: BKPT
bitField.description: Indicates a debug event generated by BKPT instruction execution or a breakpoint match in FPB

bitField.name: HALTED
bitField.description: Indicates a debug event generated by C_HALT or C_STEP request or setting DEMCR.MON_STEP

register.name: MMFAR
register.description: Shows the address of the memory location that caused an MMU fault

register.name: BFAR
register.description: Shows the address associated with a precise data access fault

register.name: AFSR
register.description: Latched version of the AUXFAULT inputs

register.name: CPACR
register.description: Specifies the access privileges for coprocessors

bitField.name: CP11
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP11 coprocessor.

bitField.name: CP10
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP10 coprocessor.

bitField.name: CP7
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP7 coprocessor.

bitField.name: CP6
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP6 coprocessor.

bitField.name: CP5
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP5 coprocessor.

bitField.name: CP4
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP4 coprocessor.

bitField.name: CP3
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP3 coprocessor.

bitField.name: CP2
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP2 coprocessor.

bitField.name: CP1
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP1 coprocessor.

bitField.name: CP0
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP0 coprocessor.

register.name: STIR
register.description: Provides a mechanism for software to generate an interrupt

bitField.name: INTID
bitField.description: Indicates the interrupt to be triggered. The value written is (ExceptionNumber - 16)

register.name: CPUID
register.description: Identification information for the processor

bitField.name: Implementer
bitField.description: Implementer code

bitField.name: Variant
bitField.description: Implementation defined

bitField.name: Constant
bitField.description: Indicates the architecture

bitField.name: Partno
bitField.description: Indicates part number

bitField.name: Revision
bitField.description: Indicates revision

bitField.name: State1
bitField.description: Thumb instruction set support

bitField.name: M_Profile
bitField.description: M profile programmers' model

bitField.name: M_Profile
bitField.description: Debug model, M profile

register.name: ID_AFR0
register.description: Implementation defined features

register.name: ID_MMFR0
register.description: Memory Model Features

bitField.name: Auxiliary_registers
bitField.description: Indicates support for Auxiliary registers

bitField.name: TCM_support
bitField.description: Indicates support for TCM

bitField.name: Shareability_levels
bitField.description: Indicates the number of shareability levels implemented

bitField.name: Outermost_shareability
bitField.description: Indicates the outermost shareability domain implemented

bitField.name: PMSA
bitField.description: Indicates support for a PMSA

register.name: ID_MMFR1
register.description: Memory Model Features

register.name: ID_MMFR2
register.description: Memory Model Features

bitField.name: WFI
bitField.description: Indicates support for wait-for-interrupt stalling.

register.name: ID_MMFR3
register.description: Memory Model Features

register.name: ID_ISAR0
register.description: Instruction Set Attributes

bitField.name: Divide_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates the supported divide instructions

bitField.name: Debug_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates the supported debug instructions

bitField.name: Coproc_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates the supported coprocessor instructions

bitField.name: CmpBranch_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for combined compare and branch instructions.

bitField.name: Bitfield_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for bitfield instructions.

bitField.name: BitCount_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for bit counting instructions.

register.name: ID_ISAR1
register.description: Instruction Set Attributes

bitField.name: Interwork_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for instructions that branch between ARM and Thumb code.

bitField.name: Immediate_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for immediate instructions.

bitField.name: IfThen_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for IfThen instructions.

bitField.name: Extend_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for sign or zero extend instructions.

register.name: ID_ISAR2
register.description: Instruction Set Attributes

bitField.name: Reversal_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates the supported reversal instructions.

bitField.name: MultU_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates the supported advanced unsigned multiply instructions.

bitField.name: MultS_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates the supported advanced signed multiply instructions.

bitField.name: Mult_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates the supported additional multiply instructions.

bitField.name: MultiAccessInt_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates the supported multi-access interruptible instructions.

bitField.name: MultiAccessInt_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates the supported memory hint instructions.

bitField.name: LoadStore_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates the supported additional load and store instructions.

register.name: ID_ISAR3
register.description: Instruction Set Attributes

bitField.name: TrueNOP_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for true NOP instructions.

bitField.name: ThumbCopy_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb copy instructions.

bitField.name: TabBranch_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for table branch instructions.

bitField.name: SynchPrim_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for synchronization primitive instructions.

bitField.name: SVC_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for SVC instructions.

bitField.name: SIMD_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for Single Instruction Multiple Data (SIMD) instructions.

bitField.name: Saturate_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for saturate instructions.

register.name: ID_ISAR4
register.description: Instruction Set Attributes

bitField.name: PSR_M_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for saturate instructions.

bitField.name: SynchPrim_instrs_frac
bitField.description: Indicates support for Synchronization Primitives

bitField.name: Barrier_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates the supported barrier instructions.

bitField.name: Writeback_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for Writeback addressing modes

bitField.name: WithShifts_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates the support for instructions with shifts:

bitField.name: Unpriv_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates the supported unprivileged instructions

register.name: FPCCR
register.description: Holds control data for the floating-point unit

bitField.name: ASPEN
bitField.description: When this bit is set to 1, execution of a floating-point instruction sets the CONTROL.FPCA bit to 1

bitField.name: LSPEN
bitField.description: Enables lazy context save of FP state

bitField.name: MONRDY
bitField.description: Indicates whether the software executing when the processor allocated the FP stack frame was able to set the DebugMonitor exception to pending

bitField.name: BFRDY
bitField.description: Indicates whether the software executing when the processor allocated the FP stack frame was able to set the BusFault exception to pending

bitField.name: MMRDY
bitField.description: Indicates whether the software executing when the processor allocated the FP stack frame was able to set the MemManage exception to pending

bitField.name: HFRDY
bitField.description: Indicates whether the software executing when the processor allocated the FP stack frame was able to set the HardFault exception to pending

bitField.name: THREAD
bitField.description: Indicates the processor mode when it allocated the FP stack frame

bitField.name: USER
bitField.description: Indicates the privilege level of the software executing when the processor allocated the FP stack frame

bitField.name: LSPACT
bitField.description: Indicates whether Lazy preservation of the FP state is active

register.name: FPCAR
register.description: Holds the location of the unpopulated floating-point register space allocated on an exception stack frame

register.name: FPDSCR
register.description: Holds the default values for the floating-point status control data that the processor assigns to the FPSCR when it creates a new floating-point context

bitField.name: AHP
bitField.description: Default value for FPSCR.AHP

bitField.name: DN
bitField.description: Default value for FPSCR.DN

bitField.name: FZ
bitField.description: Default value for FPSCR.FZ

bitField.name: RMode
bitField.description: Default value for FPSCR.RMode

register.name: MVFR0
register.description: Describes the features provided by the Floating-point extension

bitField.name: FP_Rounding_modes
bitField.description: Indicates the rounding modes supported by the FP floating-point hardware

bitField.name: Short_vectors
bitField.description: Indicates the hardware support for FP short vectors

bitField.name: Square_root
bitField.description: Indicates the hardware support for FP square root operations

bitField.name: Divide
bitField.description: Indicates the hardware support for FP divide operations

bitField.name: FP_exception_trapping
bitField.description: Indicates whether the FP hardware implementation supports exception trapping

bitField.name: Double_precision
bitField.description: Indicates the hardware support for FP double-precision operations

bitField.name: Single_precision
bitField.description: Indicates the hardware support for FP single-precision operations

bitField.name: A_SIMD
bitField.description: Indicates the size of the FP register bank

register.name: MVFR1
register.description: Describes the features provided by the Floating-point extension

bitField.name: FP_fused_MAC
bitField.description: Indicates whether the FP supports fused multiply accumulate operations

bitField.name: FP_HPFP
bitField.description: Indicates whether the FP supports half-precision floating-point conversion operations

bitField.name: D_NaN
bitField.description: Indicates whether the FP hardware implementation supports only the Default NaN mode

bitField.name: FtZ
bitField.description: Indicates whether the FP hardware implementation supports only the Flush-to-Zero mode of operation

register.name: MVFR2
register.description: Describes the features provided by the Floating-point extension

bitField.name: VFP_Misc
bitField.description: Indicates whether the FP hardware implementation supports Floating-point selection, Floating-point Conversion to Integer with Direct Rounding Modes, Floating-point Round to Integral Floating-point and Floating-point MaxNum and MinNum

register.name: STCSR
register.description: Controls the system timer and provides status data

bitField.name: COUNTFLAG
bitField.description: Indicates whether the counter has counted to 0 since the last read of this register

bitField.name: CLKSOURCE
bitField.description: Indicates the SysTick clock source

bitField.name: TICKINT
bitField.description: Indicates whether counting to 0 causes the status of the SysTick exception to change to pending

bitField.name: ENABLE
bitField.description: Indicates the enabled status of the SysTick counter

register.name: STRVR
register.description: Sets or reads the reload value of the SYST_CVR register

bitField.name: RELOAD
bitField.description: The value to load into the SYST_CVR register when the counter reaches 0

register.name: STCVR
register.description: Reads or clears the current counter value

bitField.name: CURRENT
bitField.description: This is the value of the counter at the time it is sampled

register.name: STCR
register.description: Reads the calibration value and parameters for SysTick

bitField.name: NOREF
bitField.description: Indicates whether the IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED reference clock is provided

bitField.name: SKEW
bitField.description: Indicates whether the 10ms calibration value is exact

bitField.name: TENMS
bitField.description: Optionally, holds a reload value to be used for 10ms (100Hz) timing, subject to system clock skew errors

register.name: ITCMCR
register.description: Controls whether an access is mapped to TCM or AXIM

bitField.name: SZ
bitField.description: Indicates the size of the relevant TCM

bitField.name: RETEN
bitField.description: When enabled the processor will guarantee to honour the retry output on the corresponding TCM interface

bitField.name: RMW
bitField.description: Indicates that all sub-chunk writes to a given TCM use a RMW sequence

bitField.name: EN
bitField.description: Enable TCM. When a TCM is disabled all accesses are made to the AXIM

register.name: DTCMCR
register.description: Controls whether an access is mapped to TCM or AXIM

bitField.name: TCM_Size
bitField.description: Indicates the size of the relevant TCM

bitField.name: RETEN
bitField.description: When enabled the processor will guarantee to honour the retry output on the corresponding TCM interface

bitField.name: RMW
bitField.description: Indicates that all sub-chunk writes to a given TCM use a RMW sequence

bitField.name: EN
bitField.description: Enable TCM. When a TCM is disabled all accesses are made to the AXIM

register.name: AHBSCR
register.description: Controls the priority of AHBS traffic

bitField.name: INITCOUNT
bitField.description: Use the to demote access priority of the requestor selected by the AHBSCR.CTL

bitField.name: TPRI
bitField.description: Threshold execution priority for AHBS traffic demotion.

bitField.name: CTL
bitField.description: AHBS prioritisation control

register.name: CACR
register.description: Controls L1 ECC and the L1 cache coherency usage model

bitField.name: WT
bitField.description: Enables Force WT in the instruction and data cache

bitField.name: ECC
bitField.description: Enable TCM. Enables ECC in the instruction and data cache

bitField.name: SIWT
bitField.description: Enables cache coherency usage, globally visible writes

register.name: AHBPCR
register.description: Controls accesses to AHBP or AXIM

bitField.name: SZ
bitField.description: Size of AHBP

bitField.name: EN
bitField.description: Enables AHBP. When disabled all accesses are made to the AXIM

register.name: ABFSR
register.description: Specifies the source of the asynchronous bus faults

bitField.name: EPPB
bitField.description: Asynchronous fault on EPPB interface

bitField.name: AXIM
bitField.description: Asynchronous fault on AXIM interface

bitField.name: AHBP
bitField.description: Asynchronous fault on AHBP interface

bitField.name: DTCM
bitField.description: Asynchronous fault on DTCM interface

bitField.name: ITCM
bitField.description: Asynchronous fault on ITCM interface
